Package com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter

A collection of HBase Filters to make selecting data in HBase easier.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractColumnVersionTimerangeFilter Abstract base class for filtering a column based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
ColumnVersionTimerangeFilter Filters a column selected by family and qualifier and based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
DeployedFilter Acts as a wrapper around another Filter allowing for that filter to be dynamically deployed into an HBase cluster.
DeployedFilterManager Responsible for managing the lifecycle of a DeployedFilter and, more importantly, the Filter it wraps.
FamilyOnlyColumnVersionTimerangeFilter Filters a column specified by family and based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
QualifierPrefixColumnVersionTimerangeFilter Filters a column specified by family and qualifier prefix based on a timerange and number of versions, specifically meant to implement the column selection functionality of the Query Planner.
 

Package com.opower.hadoop.hbase.filter Description

A collection of HBase Filters to make selecting data in HBase easier.
